question: Could you display the titles and links for all questions that have accumulated over 100,000 views?
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)
WHERE question.view_count > 100000
RETURN question, question.title, question.link

question: What are the display names of users who have a UUID greater than 5000?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)
WHERE user.uuid > 5000
RETURN user, user.display_name

question: List all comments that have a score less than -10.
cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)
WHERE comment.score < -10
RETURN comment, comment.uuid, comment.link, comment.score

question: What is the body markdown and link of the answer with the lowest score?
cypher:
MATCH (answer:Answer)
RETURN answer, answer.body_markdown, answer.link
ORDER BY answer.score ASC
LIMIT 1

question: What are the title and creation dates of questions that have no accepted answer?
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)
WHERE question.accepted_answer_id IS NULL
RETURN question, question.title, question.creation_date

question: What is the average view count for questions on Stack Overflow?
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)
RETURN AVG(question.view_count)

question: How many comments are there with scores exceeding 20?
cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)
WHERE comment.score > 20
RETURN COUNT(comment)

question: What is the maximum score an answer has ever received on Stack Overflow?
cypher:
MATCH (solution:Answer)
RETURN MAX(solution.score)

question: Can you compute the total number of tags used across all questions?
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT tag)

question: Determine the number of users who have submitted over 5 answers.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)
WITH user, COUNT(answer) AS answersCount
WHERE answersCount > 5
RETURN COUNT(user)

question: Identify the titles and scores of answers provided by users who commented on questions tagged with Java with a view count exceeding 1000.
cypher:
MATCH (javaTag:Tag)-[tagged:TAGGED]-(question:Question)<-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)<-[commented:COMMENTED]-(user:User)
MATCH (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)
WHERE javaTag.name="Java" AND question.view_count>1000
RETURN tagged, javaTag, question, commentedOn, comment, commented, user, provided, answer, answer.title, answer.score

question: Can you gather names of users, titles, and links of questions which they have tagged as SQL or NoSQL where these questions also have an accepted answer and more than 1500 views?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE (tag.name="SQL" OR tag.name="NoSQL") AND question.accepted_answer_id IS NOT NULL AND question.view_count>1500
RETURN asked, user, question, tagged, tag, user.display_name, question.title, question.link

question: Could you describe the connections between questions and their answers, specifically for answers scoring above 15, linked to questions labeled with the tags PHP and security?
cypher:
MATCH (answer:Answer)-[providedToQuestion:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[taggedAsPHP:TAGGED]->(tagPHP:Tag),
(question)-[taggedAsSecurity:TAGGED]->(tagSecurity:Tag)
WHERE answer.score > 15 AND tagPHP.name="PHP" AND tagSecurity.name="security"
RETURN providedToQuestion, answer, question, taggedAsPHP, tagPHP, taggedAsSecurity, tagSecurity, answer.uuid, question.uuid

question: Identify and describe the connections between users and questions where the users have both asked and provided answers, with each answer having a score exceeding 30 in topics related to networking.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag),
      (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE tag.name="networking" AND answer.score > 30
RETURN asked, provided, answered, tagged, user, question, answer, tag, user.display_name, question.title, answer.title

question: List the flow of interactions in terms of comments and answers between questions tagged C++ and users who have both commented on and answered these questions, where the comments have scores higher than 5.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag),
      (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
WHERE tag.name="C++" AND comment.score > 5
RETURN provided, answered, tagged, commented, commentedOn, user, answer, comment, question, tag, user.display_name, answer.link, comment.link, question.link, tag.name

question: Explain the relationship paths from users to their commented questions and answers on those questions for users who have more than 200 comments overall in the graph.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WITH user, COUNT(comment) AS totalComments
WHERE totalComments > 200
MATCH (user)-[commented]->(comment)-[commentedOn]->(question)<-[answered:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer)
RETURN commented, user, comment, commentedOn, question, answered, answer, user.uuid, user.display_name, question.uuid, question.title, answer.uuid, answer.title

question: Outline the linkage between the questions tagged web development that have at least 200 views and the users who have commented while providing answers to these questions where answer scores were over 25.
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag) 
WHERE tag.name="web development" AND question.view_count>=200
MATCH (answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE answer.score > 25
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer)
MATCH (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commented_on:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
RETURN tagged, question, tag, answered, answer, provided, user, commented, comment, commented_on, user.display_name

question: Determine the mean score of remarks from users who have provided accepted answers scoring over 50 to questions tagged Python.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "Python" AND answer.is_accepted = TRUE AND answer.score > 50
WITH DISTINCT user
MATCH (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)
RETURN AVG(comment.score) AS average_comment_score

question: What is the highest number of views for questions tagged iOS that a user has both posted and commented on?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="iOS"
WITH user, question
MATCH (user)-[relation6:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[relation7:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
RETURN MAX(question.view_count)

question: Could you calculate the total amount of comments on questions posted by users who have contributed answers scoring 40 or more to questions tagged Javascript?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation6:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation7:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[relation8:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "Javascript" AND answer.score >= 40
WITH DISTINCT user
MATCH (user)-[relation9:ASKED]->(askedQuestion:Question)<-[relation10:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)
RETURN COUNT(comment) AS totalComments

question: Determine the minimum and maximum scores of answers to questions tagged with artificial intelligence, asked by top 10 users in terms of total questions asked on the platform.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name = "artificial intelligence"
WITH user, COUNT(question) AS total_questions
ORDER BY total_questions DESC
LIMIT 10
MATCH (user)-[relation6:ASKED]->(question)-[relation7:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer)
RETURN MIN(answer.score) AS MinScore, MAX(answer.score) AS MaxScore

question: Find the sum of scores of all answers linked to Android tagged questions, provided by users who have comments with scores exceeding 15.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation5:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)
WHERE comment.score > 15
WITH user
MATCH (user)-[relation6:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation7:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[relation8:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name='Android'
RETURN SUM(answer.score)

question: Identify the total number of tags associated with questions which have more than 3 answers, each with a score greater than 10, asked by users with uuids more than 50000.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation4:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[relation5:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE user.uuid > 50000 AND question.answer_count > 3
WITH question, tag
MATCH (answer:Answer)-[relation6:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE answer.score > 10
WITH question, tag, COUNT(answer) AS answersWithHighScore
WHERE answersWithHighScore > 3
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT tag)

question: Can you list the display names of users who have asked questions tagged JavaScript since January 1, 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag {name:"JavaScript"})
WHERE question.creation_date >= date("2023-01-01")
RETURN user, asked, question, tagged, tag, user.display_name

question: Could you provide the titles and scores of the top 5 highest scoring answers provided by a user whose display name starts with Alice?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {display_name:"Alice"})-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)
RETURN user, provided, answer, answer.title, answer.score
ORDER BY answer.score DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the links and titles of all the questions commented on by the user with UUID 12345 within the last year?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {uuid:12345})-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WHERE question.creation_date >= date({year:2022})
RETURN user, commented, comment, commentedOn, question, question.link, question.title

question: Please show me all questions with the tag Python that have an accepted answer, including their link and answer count.
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag {name:"Python"})
WHERE question.accepted_answer_id IS NOT NULL
RETURN question, tagged, tag, question.link, question.answer_count

question: Provide the names and dates of questions created by users who have also written an answer with a score above 50.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer {score: 51})
MATCH (user)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)
RETURN user, provided, answer, asked, question, question.title, question.creation_date

question: What type of relationships exist between users named Sarah and the questions they have tagged?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {display_name:"Sarah"})-[ask:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
RETURN user, ask, question, tagged, tag

question: Could I see the relationships between comments that have a score above 10 and the questions they are linked with?
cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WHERE comment.score > 10
RETURN comment, commentedOn, question, comment.link, question.title

question: Which relationships connect answers having a score more than 100 to their corresponding questions?
cypher:
MATCH (highScoringAnswer:Answer)-[answeredRelation:ANSWERED]->(relatedQuestion:Question)
WHERE highScoringAnswer.score > 100
RETURN highScoringAnswer, answeredRelation, relatedQuestion

question: Display the types of relations between all users with a UUID ending in 990 and the questions they have asked.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[askedRelation:ASKED]->(userQuestion:Question)
WHERE user.uuid % 1000 = 990
RETURN user, askedRelation, userQuestion, user.uuid, userQuestion.uuid

question: Can you identify the type of relations between the comments and the questions that have linked back to comments scored higher than 15?
cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)-[commented_on:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WHERE comment.score > 15
RETURN comment, commented_on, question, comment.link, question.link

question: What kind of relation connects answers provided by the user with UUID 200202 and the questions that have more than 10000 views?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {uuid:200202})-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)
WHERE question.view_count > 10000
RETURN user, provided, answer, answered, question

question: What is the average score of answers provided to the questions tagged with Java?
cypher:
MATCH (answer:Answer)-[provided:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="Java"
RETURN AVG(answer.score)

question: Can you determine the total views for questions posted by users whose display name begins with Deb?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)
WHERE user.display_name STARTS WITH 'Deb'
RETURN SUM(question.view_count)

question: What is the highest score from comments on questions posted during the initial six months of 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)-[relation2:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WHERE question.creation_date >= date('2023-01-01') AND question.creation_date <= date('2023-06-30')
RETURN MAX(comment.score)

question: Can you find the total number of users who have commented on more than 3 questions last year?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WHERE question.creation_date >= date({year:2022, month:1, day:1}) AND question.creation_date < date({year:2023, month:1, day:1})
WITH user, COUNT(DISTINCT question) AS numQuestions
WHERE numQuestions > 3
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT user) AS TotalUsersCommentedOnMoreThan3Questions

question: What is the average count of tags attached to questions that have more than 5000 views?
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE question.view_count > 5000
WITH question, COUNT(tag) AS tagCount
RETURN AVG(tagCount) AS averageTagCount

question: Compute the total of all scores for answers associated with questions that have over 5 responses.
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[received:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer)
WHERE question.answer_count > 5
RETURN SUM(answer.score)

question: What is the title of the question that has an accepted answer which received more than 100 upvotes, and what tag is associated with this question?
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag), (answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE question.accepted_answer_id = answer.uuid AND answer.score > 100 AND answer.is_accepted = TRUE
RETURN question, tagged, tag, answer, answered, question.title, tag.name

question: Can you display the names of users who commented on a question titled How to optimize SQL query?, and also show the scores of their comments?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WHERE question.title = "How to optimize SQL query?"
RETURN user, commented, comment, commentedOn, question, user.display_name, comment.score

question: List the user who provided an answer to the question What is graph theory?, and include the link to the users profile along with the link of the answer.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)
WHERE question.title = "What is graph theory?"
RETURN user, provided, answer, answered, question, user.display_name, user.uuid, answer.link

question: Identify the tags associated with questions that received answers from a user named John Doe and provide the links to those tags.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation4:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation5:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE user.display_name = "John Doe"
RETURN relation5, relation4, user, answer, question, tagged, tag, tag.link

question: For the comments made on the question with UUID 12345, can you tell me the authors of these comments and the scores of the answers related to this question?
cypher:
MATCH (commentingUser:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(targetQuestion:Question {uuid: 12345}), 
      (answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(targetQuestion)
RETURN commentingUser, commented, comment, commentedOn, targetQuestion, answer, answered, commentingUser.display_name, comment.score

question: Which users posed a question and also supplied an answer to a different question on the same day, as indicated by the ASKED and PROVIDED relationships?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question),
      (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation6:ANSWERED]->(otherQuestion:Question)
WHERE date(question.creation_date) = date(otherQuestion.creation_date)
RETURN relation6, user, asked, question, provided, answer, otherQuestion

question: Find all users who have both answered and commented on the same question and list the corresponding question titles.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question),
      (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
RETURN user, provided, answer, answered, question, commented, comment, commentedOn, question.title

question: Find instances where a user both tagged a question and answered that question, ensuring to display the tag name in the output.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag), (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question)
RETURN user, asked, question, tagged, tag, provided, answer, answered, tag.name

question: Show the link to the questions where Sam has both commented and provided an answer, and include the scores of these answers.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)<-[answered:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer), (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commented_on:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
WHERE user.display_name = "Sam"
RETURN user, asked, question, answered, answer, commented, comment, commented_on, question.link, answer.score

question: What is the average score of comments on questions which have been tagged as Machine Learning?
cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)-[relation3:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)-[relation4:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="Machine Learning"
RETURN AVG(comment.score)

question: What is the highest number of views for questions with the JavaScript tag that have received at least two answers?
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[relation2:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="JavaScript" AND question.answer_count >= 2
RETURN MAX(question.view_count)

question: Compute the average score of answers to questions which both have the tag Python and were answered by the same user.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="Python"
WITH user, AVG(answer.score) AS averageScore
RETURN averageScore

question: How many questions have been asked with the tag Java which have also been answered by users with a score greater than 100 on their answers?
cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[relation4:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag), (answer:Answer)-[relation5:ANSWERED]->(question), (user:User)-[relation6:PROVIDED]->(answer)
WHERE tag.name="Java" AND answer.score > 100
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT question)
